Procrastination is a huge productivity problem with no obvious solution.
No matter how smart and efficient you work,...
...you're always gonna procrastinate in some way or another.
Just because you're procrastinating, doesn't mean you're lazy or wasting time.
In fact, procrastination actually creates time and motivation.
When you're procrastinating, in comparison to the dreadful thing you're putting off,...
...everything else seems like a piece of cake.
Clean off your desk, empty your email inbox,...
...brainstorm a new project, write a "Thank you" note.
You'll still feel bad about not doing the report,...
...but at least you'll feel good about getting something done.
